description.en: Given an int array length 3, if there is a 2 immediately followed by a 3, change the 3 to 0.
description.ru: Дан массив длины 3. Если 2 сразу следует за 3, замените 3 на 0.
description.uz: 3 elementli massivda agar 2 dan keyin 3 bo‘lsa, 3 ni 0 ga almashtiring.

solution: function fix23(nums) { if(nums[0]===2&&nums[1]===3) nums[1]=0; if(nums[1]===2&&nums[2]===3) nums[2]=0; return nums; }
